display_long_description:
# 🟨 Dominate the arena! 🟨

Walkaaos [ˈvalˈkɑːos] is a 50 level tower where each floor is procedurally generated with unique drone combinations, traps, and over 100 possible layouts. As you climb, enemies evolve with tougher stats and new abilities.

Walkaaos also features additional game modes that bend the rules of the main arena and include their own progression systems. They also can contribute to the main arena by letting you unlock new equipment.

[media]

# 🟧 Method to this madness! 🟧

Walkaaos balances between high-intensity action and approachable gameplay mechanics. Challenges are intentionally compact, letting you make real progress in just a few minutes of play.

Permanent progression includes new equipment and a checkpoint system that gives you more control over where you want to start in the tower and what kind of perk build you'll bring. Equipment is designed to feel intuitive and simple to use, yet each piece still brings its own functional twist to the game.

[media]

🟡 18 weapons and gadgets for all ranges, dealing status effects, boosting movement etc.

🟠 Multiple perks like damage up, movement enhance, faster bullets, bigger explosions, max health and heal per kill to support various playstyles.

🟤 Other game modes to have fun, gain progression and learn mechanics in.

[media]

💛 Steady stream of content updates is planned throughout early access and into full release. 💛
